DoneItCard.doneItCardParagraph: A Garment For You, Warmth And Security For Another.

LocationSelector.GeolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
LocationSelector.GeolocationError: There was an error getting your location.
LocationSelector.PermissionDenied: Permission to access your location was denied.
LocationSelector.EnableLocation: Please enable location services to use this feature.

ExplorerView.Title: Refresh Your Style: <br class='hidden md:block' /> Swap Fashion, <br class='hidden md:block' /> No Money Involved
ExplorerView.Option3:
Give a Story
to Your New Piece

Swipe.SwapTitle: Select the Garments You Want to Offer in the Swap
Swipe.SwapParagraphOne: When Sending Your Swap Request, Keep in Mind That the User Has a 5-Day Deadline to Respond. During This Time,
Swipe.SwapParagraphTwo: They Can Accept Your Request, Make a Counteroffer, or Reject It.
Swipe.SwapParagraphThree: You Can Propose the Swap by Offering One or More Garments. If Your Request Is Accepted, Both Parties Must Coordinate the Exchange of the Agreed-Upon Garments.
Swipe.EmptyClosetAlert: To Participate In Swaps, You Must Have Published At Least One Garment To Use In Your Exchange.

CreatePost.StepOneTitle: Tell Us About The Status Of Your Garment
CreatePost.StepTwoTitle: Let's Define The Categories Your Garment Is In
CreatePost.StepThreeTitle: It's Time For You To Describe Your Garment
CreatePost.DescriptionNew: Garment never used, in perfect condition.
CreatePost.DescriptionAsNew: Garment used very few times, with minimal signs of wear.
CreatePost.DescriptionUsed: Garment with visible signs of wear, such as tears, stains, or details that need to be mentioned.
CreatePost.DescriptionBadCondition: Garment with significant damage, severe wear, or requiring repair.
CreatePost.SelectGenreTitle: Select the Genre of Your Garment
CreatePost.SelectTypeTitle: Select the Type of Your Garment
CreatePost.SelectCategoryTitle: Select the Category of Your Garment
CreatePost.FinallyWhatCategory: Finally, what category is your garment in?
CreatePost.WhatTypeOfProduct: What type of product is your garment in?
CreatePost.UsageTimeInfo: This information is to know how long you have been wearing your garment.
CreatePost.FieldTooShort: Text is too short. Please add more details.
CreatePost.YouCanAlsoUpload: You can also upload your files by
CreatePost.AddTags: Add tags to your garment by
CreatePost.ABriefDescription: A brief description of your garment with its most important specifications, and what will make it stand out among other garments to increase the chances of a swap.

AuthenticationPage.AuthenticationViewParagraph: Give A Second Life To Those Clothes You No Longer Wear And Discover Your Next Look. Find Inspiration And Style By Breathing New Life Into A Second-Hand Garment.
AuthenticationPage.WelcomeBack: Welcome Back, It's a Pleasure to Have You Here
AuthenticationPage.CreateAccountFirstTitle: Let's Get to Know Each Other a Little
AuthenticationPage.CreateAccountFirstParagraph: Please, tell us your first name and last name.
AuthenticationPage.CreateAccountSecondTitleSecond: Now we need some contact details.
AuthenticationPage.CreateAccountThirdTitle: Alright, now we need a few more details.
AuthenticationPage.CreateAccountFourTitle: In which city would you like to do swaps?
AuthenticationPage.CreateAccountFourParagraph: Fill in your city and country, or use your current location.
AuthenticationPage.CreateAccountFiveParagraphFirst: For added security, your password must meet the following requirements:
AuthenticationPage.CreateAccountFiveParagraphThird: Include at least one uppercase letter.
AuthenticationPage.CreateAccountFiveParagraphFour: Include at least one lowercase letter.
AuthenticationPage.CreateAccountFiveParagraphSix: Contain at least one special character
AuthenticationPage.CreateAccountFiveParagraphSeven: Make sure that your password confirmation matches the original.

Alerts.emailInvalid: The email address is not valid.
Alerts.phoneNumberInvalid: The phone number is not valid.
Alerts.dobMissing: Please enter your date of birth.
Alerts.dobFuture: The date of birth cannot be in the future.
Alerts.passwordLength: The password must be at least 8 characters long.
Alerts.passwordUppercase: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
Alerts.passwordLowercase: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
Alerts.passwordNumber: The password must contain at least one number.
Alerts.passwordSpecialChar: The password must contain at least one special character.
Alerts.termsConditionsMissing: Please accept the terms and conditions.
Alerts.serverError: There was a problem with the server. Please try again later.
Alerts.PleaseTellUs: Please, Tell Us Your Email and Password
Alerts.InvalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
Alerts.PostCreationError: There was an error creating the post.
